sentences: SB-18 got off to a 'lackluster' start Wednesday.
The SBI failed to adopt its agenda because of differences in delegates understanding of a potential agenda item on non-Annex I national communications.

Confusion over whether the item should be included in order to address frequency of submissions, or whether its inclusion should be to discuss related funding issues indicated rifts within and between negotiating groups.
Together with the introduction of debate on budget issues, SB-18 has so far signaled that financial concerns will probably feature significantly in discussions during the coming week and a half.
